thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Keith

author: Keith
title: Keith
text:
The best thing about Solar Quote: s is all the information and advice available. Very useful in helping the consumer so he/she can make an informed decision and not be steamrolled by a sales pitch.
After considering a number of Solar Installation Quote: s I have decided on using one of the Installers recommended by Solar Quote: , as they came across as very helpful and knowledgeable and actually came to my house to give the Quote: and did not just use the internet. The installation is yet do be carried out so a review of the installer is pending.
